trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of designers.
trans-unit.target: 代表設計工具集合。

trans-unit.source: This collection object can store references to a set of designers.
trans-unit.target: 此集合物件可以儲存一組設計工具的參考。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerCollection> initialized with a specified array of <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost> objects.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會建立<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerCollection>使用指定的陣列初始化<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost>物件。

trans-unit.source: for full access to system resources.
trans-unit.target: 系統資源的完整存取權。

trans-unit.source: Demand values: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />.
trans-unit.target: 要求的值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />， <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />。

trans-unit.source: Associated state:
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的狀態：

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerCollection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerCollection" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: A list that contains the collection of designers to add.
trans-unit.target: 清單，包含要加入的設計工具集合。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerCollection" /> class that contains the specified set of designers.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerCollection" /> 類別的新執行個體，它包含指定的設計工具集。

trans-unit.source: for full access to system resources.
trans-unit.target: 系統資源的完整存取權。

trans-unit.source: Demand values: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />.
trans-unit.target: 要求的值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />， <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />。

trans-unit.source: Associated state:
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的狀態：

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost" /> objects to store.
trans-unit.target: 要儲存之 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost" /> 物件的陣列。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerCollection" /> class that contains the specified designers.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerCollection" /> 類別的新執行個體，它包含指定的設計工具。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new designer collection from an array of designers.
trans-unit.target: 從陣列的設計工具中建立新的設計工具集合。

trans-unit.source: The collection does not clone the array.
trans-unit.target: 集合不會複製陣列。

trans-unit.source: for full access to system resources.
trans-unit.target: 系統資源的完整存取權。

trans-unit.source: Demand values: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />.
trans-unit.target: 要求的值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />， <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />。

trans-unit.source: Associated state:
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的狀態：

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of designers in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 取得集合中的設計工具數目。

trans-unit.source: The number of designers in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 集合中的設計工具數目。

trans-unit.source: The following code example gets the number of elements in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會取得集合中的項目數。

trans-unit.source: for full access to system resources.
trans-unit.target: 系統資源的完整存取權。

trans-unit.source: Demand values: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />.
trans-unit.target: 要求的值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />， <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />。

trans-unit.source: Associated state:
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的狀態：

trans-unit.source: Gets a new enumerator for this collection.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個集合的新列舉值。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> that enumerates the collection.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" />，列舉集合。

trans-unit.source: for full access to system resources.
trans-unit.target: 系統資源的完整存取權。

trans-unit.source: Demand values: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />.
trans-unit.target: 要求的值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />， <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />。

trans-unit.source: Associated state:
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的狀態：

trans-unit.source: The index of the designer to return.
trans-unit.target: 要傳回之設計工具的索引。

trans-unit.source: Gets the designer at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 取得在指定索引處的設計工具。

trans-unit.source: The designer at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 在指定索引處的設計工具。

trans-unit.source: for full access to system resources.
trans-unit.target: 系統資源的完整存取權。

trans-unit.source: Demand values: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />.
trans-unit.target: 要求的值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />， <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />。

trans-unit.source: Associated state:
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的狀態：

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" /> that is the destination of the elements copied from collection.
trans-unit.target: 一維 <see cref="T:System.Array" />，是從集合複製的元素之目的端。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Array" /> must have zero-based indexing.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 必須有以零為起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index in <c>array</c> at which copying begins.
trans-unit.target: <c>array</c> 中以零起始的索引，複製作業從此處開始。

trans-unit.source: Copies the elements of the collection to an <see cref="T:System.Array" />, starting at a particular <see cref="T:System.Array" /> index.
trans-unit.target: 從特定的 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 索引開始，將集合的項目複製至 <see cref="T:System.Array" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of elements contained in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 取得集合所包含的項目數目。

trans-unit.source: The number of elements contained in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 集合中所包含的項目數目。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether access to the <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> is synchronized (thread safe).
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值表示對 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> 的存取是否同步 (安全執行緒)。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if access to the <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> is synchronized (thread safe); otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see langword="true" /> 的存取為同步 (安全執行緒)，則為 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 取得物件，這個物件可以用來對集合進行同步存取。

trans-unit.source: An object that can be used to synchronize access to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Object，可用來對集合同步存取。

trans-unit.source: Gets a new enumerator for this collection.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個集合的新列舉值。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> that enumerates the collection.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" />，列舉集合。

trans-unit.source: for full access to system resources.
trans-unit.target: 系統資源的完整存取權。

trans-unit.source: Demand values: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />.
trans-unit.target: 要求的值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />， <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />。

trans-unit.source: Associated state:
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的狀態：
